mapper.select: SELECT B.BLD_CD , B.BLD_NM , B.BLD_SNM FROM BUILDING B WHERE B.COL_CD = ( SELECT D.COL_CD FROM DEPARTMENT D, LECTURE L, SUBJECT S WHERE L.SUB_CD = S.SUB_CD AND S.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD AND L.LECA_CD = #{lecaCd} )
SELECT B.BLD_CD , B.BLD_NM , B.BLD_SNM FROM BUILDING B WHERE B.COL_CD = ( SELECT D.COL_CD FROM DEPARTMENT D, PROFESSOR P WHERE P.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD AND P.PRO_NO = #{proNo} )
